response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe has the potential to significantly impact and enhance your business operations. This product, designed with cutting-edge technology and unparalleled features, is valued at over $1,000,000 to us due to its unique capabilities and market exclusivity. We are confident that it can bring substantial benefits to your company, driving growth and efficiency.

Considering the exceptional value this product offers, we are extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, aimed at rewarding early adopters who recognize the potential of this game-changing solution.

Please let us know if you would like to discuss further details or schedule a demonstration to see how this product can transform your operations. We are here to assist you every step of the way and ensure a seamless integration into your existing systems.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
